title: Japan halts use of 1.63 mil Moderna vaccine doses over contamination
description: Japan's health ministry said Thursday that contaminants were found in some unused doses of Moderna Inc.'s COVID-19 vaccine and the use of around 1.63 million doses from the same production line has been suspended as a precaution. At least 180,000 potentially contaminated shots have already been administered in 19 of...
